QuestData.Title: Preparing for the Worst
QuestData.Description: Dark times are upon us. Karkut's spirit walks the earth and gathers the spirits of dead tuskarr.$B$BThe sons of the mist have taken many of our brethren. Soon dear Kaskala will be reduced to ashes.$B$BThere is hope yet. Not for us perhaps, but we've sent our families to Unu'pe. We fight here so there may be a future for them.$B$BThey will need supplies or they will starve. There's not enough food in Unu'pe. Salvage any supplies before it's too late for our families.
QuestData.LogDescription: Utaik wants you to gather 8 Kaskala Supplies in Kaskala.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you succeeded, $n? Our relatives in Unu'pe are depending on your efforts.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. These supplies will feed our cousins and children. Even if Kaskala falls, our tribes must carry on.
